name: Santa's Hat PRO
description:
Ho Ho Ho! Christmas is here alas! But wait, Santa has lost his other Hats! Collect a lot so that he can now give go and give you your presents!


Enjoy! :D


-No Ads
-No In App Purchases
-Just Game. Enjoy.
-Thank you for your support.



Please check out my other games and buy/download them to support me. It means a lot. Thank you once again and Merry Christmas! :)
